Product Overview: Intelligent Social Media Comment Filter**

this product designed to enhance the user experience across social media platforms, particularly in addressing the challenges posed by inappropriate, offensive, and politically sensitive content within comments. offers a comprehensive suite of features aimed at creating a safer and more positive online environment for users.

Key Features:

1. Intelligent Content Detection:
   At the core of the product is identifying instances of sensitive keywords, explicit language, and political discourse. 

2. Masking Layer Functionality:
   Upon detecting comments containing flagged content, the product render a   layer. This layer can effectively obscuring the sensitive content from direct view. Users are provided with the option to interact with the comment by clicking on it, allowing them to reveal the obscured text and engage in informed discussions.

3. User Control with Click to Show/Hide:
   The click-to-show/hide functionality empowers users to exercise control over their content consumption. By clicking on a masked comment, users can conveniently reveal the underlying content. Subsequent clicks restore the masking layer, affording users a seamless way to manage their exposure to potentially contentious or distressing comments.

4. Real-time Monitoring and Updates:
   The comment filtering operates in real time, continuously monitoring new content as it appears. This ensures that users are promptly shielded from encountering undesirable content, providing a dynamic and proactive defense against offensive remarks.
